TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_OPTIUNIFISE_INS_AFTER_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE<br/> v_are_voie BOOLEAN := FALSE ;<br/>BEGIN <br/> FOR i IN 1..pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri.COUNT LOOP<br/> IF pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri (i) IN ('INSCRIERE', 'DBA') THEN<br/> v_are_voie := TRUE ;<br/> END IF ; <br/> END LOOP ;<br/> IF v_are_voie = FALSE THEN<br/> RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR (-20148,'Nu aveti drepturi sa inserati in OPTIUNIFISE') ; <br/> END IF ;<br/> <br/> IF :NEW.idfisa <> NVL(pac_variabile_globale.vg_idfisa_crt,0) THEN <br/> pac_variabile_globale.vg_idfisa_crt := :NEW.idfisa ;<br/> SELECT seq_idmodif.NextVal INTO pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif FROM dual ;<br/> INSERT INTO admitere.modificari (idmodif, dataoram, operator, statiem, obs, cnp, <br/> idfisa, tip_modif, tabela)<br/> VALUES (pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif, SYSDATE, <br/> admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_operator, <br/> admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_statie, 'INS-OPTIUNIFISE', NULL,<br/> :NEW.idfisa, 'I', 'OPTIUNIFISE') ; <br/> END IF ;<br/> <br/> CASE<br/> -- chestionarul nu se jurnalizeaza<br/> WHEN :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 44 AND 90 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 744 AND 774 THEN<br/> NULL ;<br/><br/> -- specializari dorite la admiterea la licenta<br/> WHEN :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 14 AND 23 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 714 AND 723 THEN<br/> INSERT INTO ins_specializari VALUES (:NEW.idfisa, :NEW.codopt, :NEW.prioritate, <br/> pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif) ;<br/> <br/> -- limbile straine<br/> WHEN :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 24 AND 43 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 92 AND 93 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 724 AND 733 THEN<br/> INSERT INTO ins_LBSTRAINE VALUES (:NEW.idfisa, :NEW.codopt, :NEW.prioritate, <br/> pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif) ;<br/> <br/> -- mastere de specializare<br/> WHEN :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 501 AND 520 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 601 AND 620 THEN<br/> INSERT INTO ins_ms VALUES (:NEW.idfisa, :NEW.codopt, :NEW.prioritate, <br/> pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif) ; <br/><br/> -- mastere complementare<br/> WHEN :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 801 AND 826 OR :NEW.CODOPT BETWEEN 901 AND 917 THEN<br/> INSERT INTO ins_mc VALUES (:NEW.idfisa, :NEW.codopt, :NEW.prioritate, <br/> pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif) ; <br/><br/> ELSE<br/> INSERT INTO ins_elal VALUES (:NEW.idfisa, :NEW.codopt, :NEW.prioritate,<br/> pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif) ;<br/> <br/> <br/> END CASE ; <br/> <br/>END ;<br/>
